data.name: Intro
data.value: To use an authenticator app go through the following steps:

data.name: DownloadAppLine
data.value: Download a two-factor authenticator app like Microsoft Authenticator or Google Authenticator

data.name: ScanOrEnterKey
data.value: Scan the QR Code or enter this key

data.name: ScanOrEnterKeyTail
data.value: into your two factor authenticator app. Spaces and casing do not matter.

data.name: EnterCodeText
data.value: Once you have scanned the QR code or input the key above, your two factor authentication app will provide you with a unique code. Enter the code in the confirmation box below.

data.name: VerifiedMessage
data.value: Your authenticator app has been verified.
